recipe.title: Peanut Noodle Pasta Salad Recipe by Tasty

ingredients.ingredient: ½ cup ; creamy peanut butter ; (120 g)
1 box ; whole grain linguine, or pasta of choice
1 ; red bell pepper, thinly sliced into strips
1 ; yellow bell pepper, thinly sliced into strips
¼ cup ; chopped fresh cilantro ; (10 g)

steps.step: In a medium bowl, whisk together peanut butter, soy sauce, rice vinegar, sesame oil, Sriracha, water, minced ginger, minced garlic, and brown sugar.
Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil. Cook pasta according to instructions on the box. Drain and run cooked pasta under cold water to cool.
Pour the dressing over the pasta and vegetables and mix well. Cover and chill for at least one hour before serving.
Garnish with chopped cilantro and peanuts.
